attributes.action: Increase the number of police officers on the beat and empower them to act for the public good.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need more police on the beat, and reduced administrative burdens.  Currently many crimes are ignored due to the administrative overhead and lack of available PC or Investigative resources.  We also need to stop tying up the hands of police with politcal correctness and human rights legislation that only defends minorities and is open to abuse by the criminal fraternity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
